name: electron-system
description: a system simulation on electron system

scripts.dev: tsc && echo success compilation, initializacion electron app && cd dist && electron index.js
scripts.build:winx64: tsc && echo success compilation, building... && electron-packager ./ --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out=./build --ignore="src|.gitignore|README.md|tsconfig.json|build"
scripts.build:winx32: tsc && echo success compilation, building... && electron-packager ./ --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --out=./build --ignore="src|.gitignore|README.md|tsconfig.json|build"
scripts.build:all: tsc && echo success compilation, building... && electron-packager ./ --platform=all --arch=all --out=./build --ignore="src|.gitignore|README.md|tsconfig.json|build"

author: danny palma, Discord: Danny Palma uwu#0888 (355824156127920148)
